definition: Spirochaetes, phylum of extremophile bacteria/spiral-shaped bacterium, e.g. causing syphilis

pinyin: Bao1 rou2 shi4 luo2 xuan2 ti3
gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4

sentences.english: Results No spirochete was found in the lesions of sarcoidosis.
sentences.chinese: 结果在结节病肉芽肿病变内未发现螺旋体。

sentences.english: A number of silver discs arranged around a central helix to form a spiral .
sentences.chinese: 这些银圆片围着中心螺旋线排成一个螺旋体。

sentences.english: So far, the pathogenesis of hemorrhage caused by infection of leptospira was not elucidated.
sentences.chinese: 目前，钩端螺旋体所引起出血的机制仍未被阐明。

sentences.english: This is a first report that Lyme disease spirochete isolated from Rattus coxingi in the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 从白腹鼠分离出莱姆病螺旋体，在国内外属首次报告。

sentences.english: Objective To study the safety and effect of Leptospiral outer membrane vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的证实钩端螺旋体外膜菌苗的安全性和免疫效果。

sentences.english: The data suggest that Leptospira prefers the excitement of the big city.
sentences.chinese: 数据暗示钩端螺旋体更喜欢呆在喧闹的大城市。

sentences.english: Repeated examinations of Treponema pallidum by dark field microscope and serologic tests for syphilis were negative.
sentences.chinese: 反复暗视野查梅毒螺旋体及梅毒血清试验均阴性。

sentences.english: Spirochetes and organisms that show gliding movement can move over or through an agar gel .
sentences.chinese: 螺旋体和其他滑动的生物能在琼脂表面或里面滑行。
伯氏疏螺旋体引起莱姆病。

sentences.english: Leptospirosis may be the most common disease no one has ever heard of.
sentences.chinese: 也许从来也没人听说过钩端螺旋体病是最常见的疾病。

sentences.english: Scientists have yet to discover what caused the strange spiral structure.
sentences.chinese: 科学家还在寻找是什么造就了这个奇怪的螺旋体。

sentences.english: Haemaphysalis bispinosa may play a important role in transmission cycle of Lyme disease.
sentences.chinese: 二棘血蜱在传播莱姆病螺旋体上可能起重要作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion The organism was identified as Leptospira L-form by the multiple methods.
sentences.chinese: 结论多种方法均鉴定该菌株为钩端螺旋体L型。

sentences.english: Antibiotic Resistance Markers for Genetic Manipulations of Leptospira spp.
sentences.chinese: 钩端螺旋体菌的抗生素耐药基因。

sentences.english: Syphilis is a kind of place after because syphilis is cadaverous, helicoid is affected those who happen is venereal.
sentences.chinese: 梅毒是一种由于梅毒苍白螺旋体感染后所发生的性病。

definition: Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
